dialogueTree.title: Physical Instrument: "There's no way the perp is in here,..."
dialogueTree.text: There's no way the perp is in here, officer. Look how scarred the boards are -- all attempts to pry them off have failed.

links.title: You: "Can *I* try to get in though?"
links.text: Can *I* try to get in though?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Not this time. The opposition is in..."
links.text: Not this time. The opposition is insurmountable. But I like the spirit -- have some *points*! It's lonely and cold without points.

links.title: You: ""Kim, you think she's in there?" (P..."
links.text: "Kim, you think she's in there?" (Point at the boarded up building.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The suspect? God, I hope not -- I..."
links.text: "The suspect? God, I hope not -- I can't see a way in..." He inspects the bars. "Though many have tried."

links.title: You: "Nothing more to do here then. [Fini..."
links.text: Nothing more to do here then. [Finish thought.]
